result.title: KBTU Open Fall 2017
result.content:
Announcement!!!

Tomorrow (October 29, 2017) there is going to be a programming team contest organized twice a year by the KBTU.

The link for the registration of your team: http://acm.kbtu.kz/system/kbtuopen/

I will open the 7.522 lab at 10:30 AM, thus you can come and write the competition in study atmosphere with us.

The start is planning to be at 11:00 AM, but probably it has a chance to be postponed by one-two hours.

P.S. In the case the KBTU Open Fall 2017 competition seems hard to you, we are ready to offer an easier team contest â€” one of the past quarterfinals of the ACM ICPC.

P.S. Next Saturday there is going to be our ACM ICPC Quarterfinal. More detailed information will be posted later. But you can start to gather your team.

Good luck!
